name: Coconut Clicker
description:
You're stuck on a small island... but you're not alone!  There's a lone tree with some coconuts on it.  At the very least you'll have a few snacks before you starve to death.  Hey! Shaking this tree is actually pretty satisfying!  Is that a monkey?  Maybe they want some coconuts too!

=============================================================
A twist on the classic clicker game made for Weekly Game Jam: 189 - Small Island.  Click things and buy things so you can click things and buy things!
Controls
Zoom - Mousewheel or 1/2 (zoom in/ zoom out)
Pan - Middle click and drag or WASD

Cancel a purchase - Right click

Tools Used
- Scriptable Object Architecture (For events and shared state)
- DOTween (For monkey movements)
- Shapes for Unity (For the cooldown timer)
- Aseprite (For making all of the sprites)
- Garageband (For making the music/SFX)

Credits
Big thanks to my friend Daniel for the smoking coconut cover photo and for being a sounding board for ideas!
